description:
During this introductory course for Microsoft SharePoint 2013, we'll teach the basics of using SharePoint 2013.

We'll start with learning and navigating through the SharePoint 2013 interface.

Discover concepts to help you create sites, adding content to your site, working with libraries and lists, and users and groups.

Learning objectives include:

  • Learn the main navigational features and using SharePoint help
  • How to build a SharePoint site and create user permissions
  • Discover how to setup users and create groups

This free introductory course consists of the first set of training tutorials from the complete 10 hour course Learn SharePoint Foundation 2013 offered by Simon Sez IT on Udemy.
title: Introduction to Microsoft SharePoint Foundation 2013
